      • generateId

        public java.lang.String generateId​(java.lang.String email)
        This method generates unique id using date, time and email for each user.

      • registerUser

        public boolean registerUser​(User user)
        This method performs user registration.
        Parameters:
        user - This is user object which holds information of a user.
        Returns:
        true for successful registration and false for failure.

      • loginUser

        public boolean loginUser​(Login loginDetail)
        This method checks whether a user is registered one or not.
        Parameters:
        email - This is user provided email.
        password - This is user provided password.
        Returns:
        true if user is a registered one, else returns false.

      • getUserid

        public java.lang.String getUserid​(java.lang.String email,
                                  java.lang.String password)
        This method takes user email and password as argument and finds the unique id of that user.
        Parameters:
        email - This is user's email address.
        password - This is user's password in non encrypted form.
        Returns:
        unique id of the user whose email and password is given.

      • getUserName

        public java.lang.String getUserName​(java.lang.String email,
                                    java.lang.String password)
        This method takes user email and password as argument and finds the user name of that user.
        Parameters:
        email - This is user's email address.
        password - This is user's password in non encrypted form.
        Returns:
        user name of the user whose email and password is given.
